name: Sow & Saw - Team 13
description:
Be quick to craft ebony pieces and make your forest grow, in this high-paced farming and crafting game!

STORYLINE

Time is running out, and your customers are waiting in a neverending queue! Harvest ebony for your woodshop while making sure to plant and preserve trees. Cut, carve and decorate precious wood to build lovely art pieces. Sell them before your store closes, and don't mess up orders. Can you make your woodshop and your forest flourish together?

GAMEPLAY

- You have 2 daily to-do lists: ENVIRONMENTAL and BUSINESS. Try and complete every listed objective.

- Each day has a timed length: reach as many goals as you can before the sun's out!

- Harvest ebony from your parcel and gather timber for your woodshop.

- Craft the exact specific pieces asked by your customers.

- Sell your work of art to earn money and pay debt.

- Customers are waiting, but don't make mistakes on orders. Else, you'll have to throw items aways and you will lose precious time!

- Be green! Plant ebony trees to make them grow again, don't cut too many and take care of Mother Nature.

FEATURES

- Solo playing game in a top-down view.

- Experience the life of a hugely popular carpenter in his small woodshop.

- Please customers, maintain your forest and don't be crushed by time pressure!

- Shape ebony in 9 distinct objects, through 8 different machines.

- Respond to orders from 1 to 5 customers at the same time.

- Enjoy our cartoonesque pixel art, paying tribute to classic farming indie games.

- Playable with any controller with one stick and two buttons.

CONTROLS (Xbox One controller)

Cut trees: MASH  

Take/Drop items: PRESS

Use machine: PRESS OR HOLD  (depends on the machine)

2 - Unzip your new file.

3- Launch 'Godfather 2020 Jam' File.
